CustomField.formula: OR( AND( TEXT($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) != '3' , Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) ), /*AMERICAS*/ AND( TEXT($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) = '3' , OR( TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '219', /*MIDWEST & MIDATLANTIC*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '259', /*NORTHEAST*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '68', /*WEST COAST*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '69', /*SOUTHEAST*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '63', /*USA DIGITAL*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '22', /*HAWAII*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '53', /*CENTRAL*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '940'), /*NORTHWEST*/ Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) ), /*SOUTH AMERICA*/ AND( TEXT($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) = '3' , OR( TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '419', /*COLOMBIA*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '5', /*CHILE*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '3', /*BRAZIL*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '4', /*BRAZIL DIGITAL*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '87', /*ARGENTINA*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '859'), /*PERU*/ OR( Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '419', Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '5', Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '3', Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '4', Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '87', Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '859') ), /*CANADA*/ AND( TEXT($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) = '3' , OR( TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '7', /*CANADA DIGITAL*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '88'), /*CANADA*/ OR( Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '7', /*CANADA DIGITAL*/ Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '88') /*CANADA*/ ), /*MEXICO/CARIBBEAN*/ AND( TEXT($User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) = '3' , OR( TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '54', /*MEXICO*/ TEXT($User.MGMT_ZONE_SUB_LEVEL2__c) = '179' /*MEXICO/CARIBBEAN*/), OR( Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '179', /*CARIBBEAN/CENTRAL AMERICA*/ Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '979', /*MEXICO DIGITAL*/ Store__r.ManagementLevel2__r.Level2Id__c = '54') /*MEXICO*/ ))
CustomField.label: My Region ?
